title: Chest (Pirate's Treasure)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The chest inside the Blue Moon Inn can be opened with the chest key to obtain the Pirate message during the Pirate's Treasure quest. As the key dissolves upon opening the chest, it can normally be opened only once. However, if the player obtained more than one chest key trough Drop Tricking the chest may be opened multiple times by using the key on it. This allows for the player to obtain multiple messages as long as they didn't advance to the next quest stage by reading the pirates message.

content:
Chest
Released11 June 2001 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestPirate's Treasure
LocationUpstairs inside the Blue Moon Inn
OptionsOpen
ExamineI wonder what's inside?
Map
Advanced data
Object ID2079

The chest inside the Blue Moon Inn can be opened with the chest key to obtain the Pirate message during the Pirate's Treasure quest. As the key dissolves upon opening the chest, it can normally be opened only once. However, if the player obtained more than one chest key trough Drop Tricking the chest may be opened multiple times by using the key on it. This allows for the player to obtain multiple messages as long as they didn't advance to the next quest stage by reading the pirates message.

Each time the player successfully opens the chest, these messages will appear in the chatbox:

  • "You unlock the chest."
  • "All that's in the chest is a message..."
  • "You take the message from the chest."

The '''chest''' inside the [[Blue Moon Inn]] can be opened with the [[Chest key (Pirate's Treasure)|chest key]] to obtain the [[Pirate message]] during the [[Pirate's Treasure]] [[quest]]. As the key dissolves upon opening the chest, it can normally be opened only once. However, if the player obtained more than one chest key trough [[Drop Trick]]ing the chest may be opened multiple times by using the key on it. This allows for the player to obtain multiple messages as long as they didn't advance to the next quest stage by reading the pirates message.

Each time the player successfully opens the chest, these messages will appear in the [[chatbox]]:
*"You unlock the chest."
*"All that's in the chest is a message..."
*"You take the message from the chest."
